name: viirs_ntl_monthly_v10_vcmcfg_cf_cvg
title: Monthly VIIRS Nighttime Lights v1 - Count of Cloud Free Coverage
description: Monthly VIIRS nighttime lights product Version 1. Count of pixels within boundary with at least 1 cloud free observation of nighttime lights. Can be used in combination with VIIRS Nighttime Light Average product to determine if sufficient coverage exists with boundary features.
details: Excludes any data impacted by stray light

extract_types_info.sum: count of pixels with at least one cloud free measurement within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: C. D. Elvidge, K. E. Baugh, M. Zhizhin, and F.-C. Hsu, “Why VIIRS data are superior to DMSP for mapping nighttime lights,” Asia-Pacific Advanced Network 35, vol. 35, p. 62, 2013.
extras.sources_name: Earth Observation Group - VIIRS Nighttime Lights
